data.actual_result: Higher role don't have lock icon, but is still non selectable
data.expected_result: Role that is higher than yours should have lock icon
data.short_description: Lock icon not showing on higher role in "members" menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Have role with manage permissions (not highest in hiearchy) - Enter "members" setting screen in server settings - Select member you want to change roles
